forumNotes.author: Guest_Boot_Monkey_*
forumNotes.content:
I know of some tools that can perform drive copying by using sector-to-sector method, but I was wondering what people would recommend to copy a USB Stick to multiple USB sticks? Example: You've now just finished configuring the ultimate bootable usb stick that's got everything you want and need. It's got a cool boot menu using Grub4Dos with all your bits and pieces. You now want to make 10 or more copies of that stick, without having to run the "Copy-To-Usb" script in WinBuilder.
What would people recommend?

forumNotes.author: steve6375
forumNotes.content:
Passmark have a free utility to do just that!  
[http://www.osforensi...usb-images.html](http://www.osforensics.com/tools/write-usb-images.html "External link")
